overview: A legacy of terror for more than 150 years. Haunted by a tradition of blood and mystery. Aaron's House is a place visited by few, but known about by many. A paranormal debunker, a dead serial killer and his proteg√©, two FBI agents, a mythical cult, and the legend of Aaron Wiley, culminate and collapse upon Aaron's House.
tagline: A legacy of terror for more than 150 years.
title: Aaron's House
